Module io.github.mmm.event

Package io.github.mmm.event

Provides the API and base implementation for generic eventing.
See Also:
EventListener, EventSource, AbstractEventSource
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EventListener<E>
    Interface for a generic event listener.
    EventSource<E,​L extends EventListener<?>>
    Interface for a source of events that allows to add and remove EventListeners.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEventSource<E,​L extends EventListener<?>>
    Implementation of EventSource.
    EventSourceAdapter<E,​L extends EventListener<?>>
    Adapter for EventSource.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ChangeType
    This enum contains the available types of a change.
